gluttony.question: Did I overindulge in eating or drinking beyond what is reasonable, particularly during social gatherings with friends and family?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

extracted_data_phrases: during conversations or discussions with friends and family
gossip.question: Have I taken pleasure in sharing others' private affairs, even if what I shared was true, during conversations or discussions with friends and family?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

extracted_data_phrases: for my own amusement or to impress friends
gossip.question: Have I indulged in discussing others' private affairs, even if what was shared was true, for my own amusement or to impress friends?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

gossip.question: Have I entertained myself by discussing others' private affairs, even if what I shared was true?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.
